topic: 19. One reason that version control is difficult for WebApps is that in an uncontrolled environment, you can have multiple authors making changes to the same files from multiple locations without any realizing it.
topic_cn: 19. 版本控制对于Web应用来说较为困难的一个原因是，在一个不受控的环境中，可能有多个作者在不同地点对同一文件进行更改，而彼此并不知情。
